[`Workspace`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace.md) â€º [`layoutReady`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/layoutReady.md)

## Workspace.layoutReady property

If the layout of the app has been successfully initialized. To react to the layout becoming ready, use [Workspace.onLayoutReady()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/onLayoutReady.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
layoutReady: boolean;
```
